Ada Apa di Balik Mundurnya Anak Buah Anies Saat Heboh Anggaran?
02 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Kabar mengagetkan datang dari Balai Kota Jakarta. Dua bawahan Gubernur DKI, Anies Baswedan, mundur mendadak dari jabatannya di tengah sorotan terhadap rencana anggaran ibu kota. Ada apa di baliknya?
Dua anak buah Anies yang mundur itu adalah Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan (Kadisparbud) DKI, Edy Junaedi, serta Kepala Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra. Keduanya mundur dalam waktu yang berdekatan.
Awalnya, kabar mundurnya Edy dari jabatan Kadisparbud dibenarkan oleh Kepala Badan Kepegawaian Daerah (BKD), Chaidir. Dia menyebut Edy mengundurkan pada 31 Oktober 2019 atas permintaan pribadi. Edy sendiri baru 8 bulan duduk di posisi Kadisparbud.
"Per tanggal 31, semalam dia mengundurkan diri. Ya mengundurkan diri saja atas permintaan pribadi, alasannya ya pribadi yang tahu dia," kata Chaidir saat dikonfirmasi, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Pekan lalu, salah satu rencana anggaran di Disparbud sempat ramai dibahas. Di Rancangan Plafon Anggaran Sementara (PPAS), tepatnya pada dokumen Lampiran III Komisi B, terlihat ada program kegiatan 'Penyelenggaraan aktivitas promosi pariwisata dan budaya melalui media sosial'.
Sasarannya adalah 'Jumlah influencer aktivitas promosi pariwisata dan budaya melalui media sosial'. Targetnya, ada lima influencer yang diikutsertakan. Anggaran untuk lima influencer yang mempromosikan pariwisata Ibu Kota ini sebesar Rp 5.008.691.930. Namun, rencana anggaran Rp 5 miliar untuk influencer tersebut kemudian dihapus.
Apakah ada kaitannya?

What's Behind the Anies Man's Resignation When Budget Splashy?
02 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The shocking news came from the Jakarta City Hall. Two subordinates of DKI Governor, Anies Baswedan, resigned suddenly from their positions in the spotlight of the capital budget plan. What's behind it?
Anies two retired men were the Head of the Jakarta Tourism and Culture Office (Kadisparbud), Edy Junaedi, and the Head of the Regional Planning and Development Agency (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra. Both of them retreat in close proximity.
Initially, the news of Edy's resignation from the office of Kadisparbud was confirmed by the Head of the Regional Personnel Agency (BKD), Chaidir. He called Edy to resign on 31 October 2019 at his personal request. Edy himself has only been sitting in the Head of Culture and Culture for eight months.
"As of the 31st, last night he resigned. Yes, just resigned at a personal request, the reason is that someone personally knows him," Chaidir said when confirmed, Friday (11/01/2019).
Last week, one of the budget plans at Disparbud was briefly discussed. In the Provisional Budget Ceiling Design (PPAS), precisely in the document in Appendix III of Commission B, there is a program of activities called 'Organizing tourism and cultural promotion activities through social media'.
The goal is 'Number of influencers in tourism and cultural promotion activities through social media'. The target is to have five influencers included. The budget for the five influencers promoting capital city tourism is Rp. 5,008,691,930. However, the Rp 5 billion budget plan for influencers was later removed.
Is there a connection?
